title: Pimento Memento with Maurice Peebles
description:
Get your batteries ready because we’ve got one hell of a jawn for you this week. Nope not that kind, but the boys are dialing in their old pal and new editor-in-chief of Complex, Maurice Peebles. Maurice is tapping in to talk #FreeFashionBros, allegedly getting banned from Augusta, the ever-changing media landscape, becoming a suit, all things Philly sports, the future of the NFL, NBA Twitter and much more on this episode of The Only Podcast That Matters™, a tradition unlike any other.
 
For more Throwing Fits, check us out on Patreon: www.patreon.com/throwingfits.
dc:creator: Throwing Fits
